sn22.95:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ayujjhāyaṃ viharati gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre.
sn22.95:5.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ gaṅgā nadī mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍaṃ āvaheyya.
sn22.95:5.2: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.
sn22.95:5.3: Tassa taṃ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya, tucchakaññeva khāyeyya, asārakaññeva khāyeyya.
sn22.95:5.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ … pe …

sn22.95:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gimhānaṃ pacchime māse ṭhite majjhanhike kāle marīcikā phandati.
sn22.95:7.2: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.

sn22.95:7.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yā kāci saññā … pe ….
sn22.95:8.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno tiṇhaṃ kuṭhāriṃ ādāya vanaṃ paviseyya.
sn22.95:8.2: So tattha passeyya mahantaṃ kadalikkhandhaṃ ujuṃ navaṃ akukkukajātaṃ.
sn22.95:8.4: mūle chetvā agge chindeyya, agge chetvā pattavaṭṭiṃ vinibbhujeyya.
sn22.95:8.5: So tassa pattavaṭṭiṃ vinibbhujanto pheggumpi nādhigaccheyya, kuto sāraṃ.
sn22.95:8.6: Tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.
